This script recapitulates the visualization of replicates for B6 and P5 and the juvenile samples. 

# Load data and libraries

```{r data, message=FALSE}
# Libraries
library(scater)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(plyr)
library(openxlsx)
library(cowplot)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(pheatmap)
library(viridis)
source("../Functions/auxiliary.R")

# Single cell data
sce.all <- readRDS("../../../Dropbox (Cambridge University)/SST_spermatocytes/Analysis/data/10X_data/SCE_all.rds")
sce.all <- sce.all[,!(colData(sce.all)$AnnotatedClusters %in% c(paste("NA", 1:5, sep = ""), "Outliers"))]
```

# Visualize the two batches for adult B6 and P5

```{r}
# Adult B6
B6 <- sce.all[,grepl("B6", colData(sce.all)$Sample)]

# Calculate tSNE
set.seed(12345)
B6 <- runTSNE(B6)

adult.batches <- ggplot(data.frame(tSNE1 = reducedDims(B6)$TSNE[,1],
                  tSNE2 = reducedDims(B6)$TSNE[,2],
                  batch = colData(B6)$Library)) + 
  geom_point(aes(tSNE1, tSNE2, colour = batch, size = batch)) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = c("black", "red")) +
  scale_size_manual(values = c(3,1)) + 
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
          panel.background = element_blank(),
          axis.text = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank(),
          axis.title = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold")) + ggtitle("B6")

# P5
P5 <- sce.all[,grepl("P5", colData(sce.all)$Sample)]

# Calculate tSNE
set.seed(12345)
P5 <- runTSNE(P5)

P5.batches <- ggplot(data.frame(tSNE1 = reducedDims(P5)$TSNE[,1],
                  tSNE2 = reducedDims(P5)$TSNE[,2],
                  batch = colData(P5)$Library)) + 
  geom_point(aes(tSNE1, tSNE2, colour = batch, size = batch)) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = c("black", "red")) +
  scale_size_manual(values = c(3,1)) + 
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
          panel.background = element_blank(),
          axis.text = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank(),
          axis.title = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold")) + ggtitle("P5")
```

# Visualize all samples together

```{r}
# tSNE all samples
cur_color_vector <- brewer.pal(10,"Paired")

samples <- ggplot(data = data.frame(tSNE1 = reducedDims(sce.all)$TSNE[,1],
                         tSNE2 = reducedDims(sce.all)$TSNE[,2],
                         sample = colData(sce.all)$Sample)) +
    geom_point(aes(tSNE1, tSNE2, colour = sample)) +
    scale_color_manual(values = cur_color_vector) + 
    theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
          panel.background = element_blank(),
          axis.text = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank(),
          axis.title = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"), 
          line = element_blank()) + ggtitle("Samples")

# tSNE all samples - clusters
cluster <- ggplot(data = data.frame(tSNE1 = reducedDims(sce.all)$TSNE[,1],
                         tSNE2 = reducedDims(sce.all)$TSNE[,2],
                         group = colData(sce.all)$AnnotatedClusters)) +
    geom_point(aes(tSNE1, tSNE2, colour = group)) +
    scale_color_manual(values = metadata(sce.all)$color_vector) + 
    theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
          panel.background = element_blank(),
          axis.text = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank(),
          axis.title = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"), 
          line = element_blank()) + ggtitle("Cluster")

```


# Visualize the different juvenile samples and adult cells

```{r}
plot.list <- list()
for(i in paste("P", c(5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35), sep = "")){
  select <- grepl(paste(i, "|B6", sep = ""), colData(sce.all)$Sample)
  cur_df <- data.frame(tsne1 = reducedDims(sce.all)$TSNE[select,1],
                     tsne2 = reducedDims(sce.all)$TSNE[select,2],
                     clusters = ifelse(grepl("B6", colData(sce.all)$Sample[select]),
                                       "B6",
                       as.character(colData(sce.all)$AnnotatedClusters)[select])) 
  
  plot.list[[i]] <- ggplot(cur_df) +
  geom_point(aes(tsne1, tsne2, colour = clusters), size = 0.5) + scale_color_manual(values = c(metadata(sce.all)$color_vector, "B6" = "light grey")) + 
  ylab("tSNE 2") + xlab("tSNE 1") +
    theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
          panel.background = element_blank(),
          axis.text = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank(),
          axis.title = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold")) + 
    guides(colour = FALSE)
}


```


# Save final figure

```{r final}
A <- plot_grid(adult.batches + theme(legend.position = c(.8,.9)), P5.batches + theme(legend.position = c(.8,.9)), ncol = 1, nrow = 2)
B <- plot_grid(samples + theme(legend.position=c(1,.9)), cluster + theme(legend.position = "none"), ncol = 1, nrow =2)
AB <- plot_grid(A, B, ncol = 2, nrow = 1, rel_widths=c(2,3))
legend <- get_legend(cluster + theme(legend.position = "right"))
C <- plot_grid(plot.list[[1]], plot.list[[2]], legend, plot.list[[3]], 
                   plot.list[[4]], NULL, plot.list[[5]], plot.list[[6]], plot.list[[7]], ncol = 3, nrow = 3)
final <- plot_grid(AB, C, ncol = 1, nrow = 2)
ggsave(filename = "../../../Dropbox (Cambridge University)/SST_spermatocytes/Revisions/Results/New_figures/Supplemental_figures/Fig_S2/Fig_S2.pdf", 
       final, width = 15, height = 20)
```
